It is hard, but it’s harder to ignore it
-Cat Stevens
  
Take Action

title: About
text:
A group of Inland Northwest anglers and conservationists that enjoy overindulging in fishing.

Conservation
We believe in the strength of community power, leveraging collective efforts for the betterment of rivers and their ecosystems. Our commitment extends to cultivating an informed and engaged community that is involved in the protection and enhancement of our natural environments.


Fishing
As a hub for fly fishing enthusiasts, we provide a wealth of information on locations, techniques, and inspirations. Our goal is to cultivate a vibrant and knowledgeable community of anglers who share a passion for fly fishing. Through this hub, we aim to inspire and connect individuals, fostering a sense of camaraderie among fly fishing enthusiasts.

title: Tiki Drinks
text:
3 Dots and a Dash






1.5oz rhum agricole vieux 
0.5oz blended aged rum 
0.5oz lime juice 
0.5oz orange juice 
0.5oz honey syrup
0.25oz velvet falernum 
0.25oz allspice dram
1 dash angostura bitters 

Flash blend with ice. Garnish with three maraschino cherries and a pineapple frond

title: John Barr’s Meat Whistle
text:
Tightlinevideo

Hook: Long-shank jig hook (here a Mustad 32833NP-BN), sizes 1/0-2.
Head: Copper tungsten conehead, large.
Tail/Body: Rusty brown rabbit zonker strip.
Thread: Rusty brown, 6/0 or 140-denier.
Underbody: Copper brown/pearl Sparkle Braid.
Flash: Copper Flashabou.
Legs: Pumpkin Barred Sili Legs.
Collar: Brown Grizzly Saddle Hackle.
Thread dam: Rusty brown, 6/0 or 140-denier


InTheRiffle

Hook: #02-08 Daiichi 4660 Jig
Cone: Large Copper Conehead
Thread: Rust UTC 140
Rib: Brassie Copper Wire
Body: Red or Orange Holographic Diamond Braid
Tail: Rust or Brown Zonker Strip
Legs: Orange Barred Speckled Crazy Legs
Collar: Brown Select Strung Marabou
Flash: Copper Flashabou
Glue: Brush On ZAP A GAP

Collar: SLF Spikey Squirrel Dubbing - Natural Gray

Weight: .010 wire

Body: Mop material - mop-bodies
Head/Thorax: Siman Peacock Dubbing; Peacock Black
